database_schema.create_table_sql:
CREATE TABLE profiles (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    Full name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    Industry VARCHAR(255),
    Job title VARCHAR(255),
    Sub Role VARCHAR(255),
    Industry 2 VARCHAR(255),
    Emails VARCHAR(255),
    Mobile VARCHAR(255),
    Phone numbers VARCHAR(255),
    Company Name VARCHAR(255),
    Company Industry VARCHAR(255),
    Company Website VARCHAR(255),
    Company Size VARCHAR(255),
    Company Founded VARCHAR(255),
    Location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    Locality VARCHAR(255),
    Metro VARCHAR(255),
    Region VARCHAR(255),
    Skills VARCHAR(255),
    First Name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    Middle Initial VARCHAR(255),
    Middle Name VARCHAR(255),
    Last Name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    Birth Year VARCHAR(255),
    Birth Date VARCHAR(255),
    Gender VARCHAR(255),
    LinkedIn Url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    LinkedIn Username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    Facebook Url VARCHAR(255),
    Facebook Username VARCHAR(255),
    Twitter Url VARCHAR(255),
    embedding vector(1536),
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);
indexes_sql: CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY profiles_embedding_hnsw_idx ON profiles USING hnsw (embedding vector_cosine_ops);
CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY idx_profiles_Full name ON profiles(Full name);
CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY idx_profiles_Location ON profiles(Location);
CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY idx_profiles_Locality ON profiles(Locality);
CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY idx_profiles_Region ON profiles(Region);
CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY idx_profiles_First Name ON profiles(First Name);

enhanced_database_schema.create_table_sql:
-- Semantic Talent Finder - Production Database Schema
-- Generated from LinkedIn dataset analysis
-- Optimized for vector similarity search and AI-powered matching

-- Enable required PostgreSQL extensions
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS vector;
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS pg_trgm;
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS btree_gin;

-- Main profiles table with semantic search optimization
CREATE TABLE profiles (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    
    -- Core Identity Fields (High Quality - Low Null %)
    full_name VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
    first_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    linkedin_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
    linkedin_username VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    
    -- Professional Information
    job_title VARCHAR(300),
    industry VARCHAR(200),
    company_name VARCHAR(300),
    company_industry VARCHAR(200),
    
    -- Geographic Information (Hierarchical)
    location VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, -- Primary location string
    
    -- Skills and Expertise (Optimized for Search)
    skills TEXT[], -- Array of skills for efficient querying
    skills_text TEXT, -- Concatenated skills for full-text search
    technical_skills TEXT[], -- Technical skills subset
    soft_skills TEXT[], -- Soft skills subset
    
    -- Experience and Seniority
    years_experience INTEGER, -- Calculated years of experience
    experience_level VARCHAR(50), -- entry, mid, senior, management, executive
    seniority_score INTEGER, -- Computed seniority score (0-100)
    
    -- Computed Text Fields for Semantic Search
    headline VARCHAR(500), -- Professional headline/summary
    professional_summary TEXT, -- Combined professional description
    searchable_content TEXT, -- Optimized content for embedding generation
    
    -- Contact Information (Optional)
    email VARCHAR(320), -- RFC 5322 compliant length
    phone VARCHAR(50),
    mobile VARCHAR(50),
    
    -- Social Media
    facebook_url VARCHAR(500),
    twitter_url VARCHAR(500),
    
    -- Company Details
    company_website VARCHAR(500),
    company_size VARCHAR(100),
    company_founded VARCHAR(20),
    
    -- AI/ML Fields
    embedding vector(1536) NOT NULL, -- OpenAI text-embedding-3-small
    embedding_version VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'v1.0', -- Track embedding model version
    content_hash VARCHAR(64), -- SHA-256 hash for detecting changes
    
    -- Metadata
    data_source VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'linkedin',
    data_quality_score DECIMAL(3,2), -- 0.00 to 1.00
    last_profile_update TIMESTAMP,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Vector Similarity Index (HNSW for fast approximate search)
CREATE INDEX profiles_embedding_hnsw_idx ON profiles USING hnsw (embedding vector_cosine_ops)
    WITH (m = 16, ef_construction = 64);

-- Core Identity Indexes
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX profiles_linkedin_username_idx ON profiles(linkedin_username);
CREATE INDEX profiles_full_name_idx ON profiles(full_name);
CREATE INDEX profiles_name_trgm_idx ON profiles USING gin (full_name gin_trgm_ops);

-- Professional Search Indexes
CREATE INDEX profiles_job_title_idx ON profiles(job_title);
CREATE INDEX profiles_industry_idx ON profiles(industry);
CREATE INDEX profiles_company_idx ON profiles(company_name);
CREATE INDEX profiles_experience_level_idx ON profiles(experience_level);

-- Geographic Search Indexes
CREATE INDEX profiles_location_idx ON profiles(location);
CREATE INDEX profiles_region_idx ON profiles(region);
CREATE INDEX profiles_country_idx ON profiles(country);
CREATE INDEX profiles_geo_hierarchy_idx ON profiles(country, region, locality);

-- Skills Search Indexes
CREATE INDEX profiles_skills_gin_idx ON profiles USING gin (skills);
CREATE INDEX profiles_technical_skills_gin_idx ON profiles USING gin (technical_skills);
CREATE INDEX profiles_skills_text_trgm_idx ON profiles USING gin (skills_text gin_trgm_ops);

-- Full-Text Search Index
CREATE INDEX profiles_searchable_content_fts_idx ON profiles USING gin (to_tsvector('english', searchable_content));

-- Performance Indexes
CREATE INDEX profiles_quality_score_idx ON profiles(data_quality_score) WHERE data_quality_score >= 0.7;
CREATE INDEX profiles_updated_at_idx ON profiles(updated_at);
CREATE INDEX profiles_compound_search_idx ON profiles(industry, experience_level, country) WHERE data_quality_score >= 0.7;

-- Skills lookup table for standardization
CREATE TABLE skills_dictionary (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    skill_name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    skill_category VARCHAR(100), -- technical, soft, industry
    skill_type VARCHAR(50), -- programming, framework, tool, etc.
    synonyms TEXT[], -- Alternative names
    popularity_score INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE INDEX skills_dictionary_name_idx ON skills_dictionary(skill_name);
CREATE INDEX skills_dictionary_category_idx ON skills_dictionary(skill_category);

-- Search analytics table
CREATE TABLE search_queries (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    query_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    query_embedding vector(1536),
    user_session VARCHAR(100),
    results_count INTEGER,
    execution_time_ms INTEGER,
    filters_applied JSONB,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE INDEX search_queries_created_at_idx ON search_queries(created_at);
CREATE INDEX search_queries_embedding_idx ON search_queries USING hnsw (query_embedding vector_cosine_ops);

preprocessing_steps: Remove HTML tags and special characters

content_validation: at least one of job_title or industry must be present
